title: Gear Change Rod Setting

body.body: If accessory fit Triumph Shift Assist (TSA) is fitted, the length of the rod should not be altered.
Gear Rod Setting LG1; LGX; LJ2; LK2
If the gear change linkage needs to be removed, make sure the setting dimension and alignment are as described below when refitting.
Make sure the alignment mark on the gear pedal crank lines up to the alignment mark on the gear change shaft
Make sure the distance between the flats of the ball joints is 242.5 mm as shown below.
The length of exposed thread at each end of the gear change rod should be equal.
Tighten the gear change rod lock nuts to
Make sure the gear change mechanism is free to operate, without any excessive play.
